summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 19, Renton's Addition, being the alley between 17th Avenue and 18th Avenue, From East Pike Street to East Pine Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14559 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
